result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact or Sexual Intercourse w/ Person under Age of 13

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew C Kunstman

records.addlTxt: Request and Response Regarding Open Records - emailed Criminal Complaint 10-12-2022
Adjourned initial appearance on November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:47 PM Defendant Andrew C Kunstman appeared by video, in custody. Special appearance by Attorney Heather M Faeh in court for Andrew C Kunstman.  Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Public Defender has not appointed counsel for the defendant and requests an adjournment. 
Bail is set at $5,000  recognizance bond with the condition that he is to have no contact with R.S. or L.S. or any persons under the age of 18 other than incidental contact. The defendant must also report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours, or if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrew C Kunstman
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-27-2022)
Prior: 121 Paine St 1, Kiel, WI 53042

RE:  1st degree sexual assault-sexual contact with a child under age 13, on 06-17-22.
Initial appearance is set for 10-03-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1
